name.baseName: The production of MDF ; Medium-density fiberboard (MDF) ; Hybrid-modified ammonium lignosulfonate (HMAL) as the binder
MDF的生产 ; 中密度纤维板（MDF） ; 木质素磺酸混合改性铵（HMAL）作为粘合剂

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: In this paper, the functional unit is 1 m3 of finished MDF, which has an average density of 0.86 g/cm3 , with nominal width of 1220 mm. The board thickness is 5 mm and a moisture content of ~8%. However, an alternative MDF, manufactured using a novel lignin-based binder, namely MDF, made from hybrid-modified industrial lignin and wood fiber (HMAL/WF), is evaluated in this study.
在本文中，功能单位是 1 立方米的中密度纤维板成品，其平均密度为 0.86 克/立方厘米，标称宽度为 1220 毫米。板材厚度为 5 毫米，含水率约为 8%。不过，本研究评估了使用新型木质素基粘合剂制造的另一种中密度纤维板，即由混合改性工业木质素和木纤维（HMAL/WF）制成的中密度纤维板。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The stage for the supply of raw materials includes the manufacturing of wood fibers and ammonium lignosulfonate (AL) and the use of energy, water, and other materials during the processing of the fibers. The main sources of biomass are wood fibers consisting of a blend of softwood and hardwood fibers from different species. The wood fibers are transported by a truck from the Greater Khingan Range Hengyou Furniture Co., Ltd. All auxiliary materials used are commercial and purchased from different suppliers. In the production of HMAL/WF, the main material for the HMAL production is AL, which is purchased from Shenyang Xingzhenghe Chemical Co., Ltd. For the conventional MDF process, only fossil-based UF resin that is used is different than that of HMAL/WF production. The inventory data for the resin manufacturing stage consist of a primary average data, obtained from a chemical company in China. The northeast region is abundant in wood resources. According to a Chinese Forestry Administration report (2014), the production in the northeast forest industry reached 18% of the total production (~75 billion dollars) in China. For the preliminary research, Harbin, an urban region in the Northeast, is set as a representative. In board manufacturing stage, a representative factory with an approximate production capacity of 150,000 m3 /year is selected for a detailed study of the process.

原材料供应阶段包括木质纤维和木质素磺酸铵（AL）的生产，以及纤维加工过程中能源、水和其他材料的使用。生物质的主要来源是由不同树种的软木和硬木纤维混合而成的木纤维。木纤维由一辆卡车从大兴安岭恒友家具有限公司运来。使用的所有辅助材料均为商业材料，从不同的供应商处购买。在 HMAL/WF 的生产中，HMAL 生产的主要材料是 AL，购自沈阳兴正和化工有限公司。在传统中密度纤维板工艺中，只有化石基 UF 树脂的使用与 HMAL/WF 生产不同。树脂生产阶段的库存数据来自中国一家化工企业的原始平均数据。东北地区木材资源丰富。根据中国林业局的一份报告（2014 年），东北林业的产量达到中国总产量（约 750 亿美元）的 18%。在初步研究中，以东北城市哈尔滨为代表。在板材生产阶段，选择了一家年产量约为 15 万立方米的代表性工厂，对生产过程进行详细研究。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The general steps in the production of HMAL/WF are similar to the conventional MDF process. The wood fibers are mixed with different proportions of HMAL binder and pre-pressed to form a mat at a moisture content of ~20%, which promotes a good natural fiber to fiber inter-felting and bonding with the lignin-based binder. Then, the fiber mat is hot-pressed at 170 °C for 420 s using a mechanically controlled oil-heated press for the final board formation.
生产 HMAL/WF 的一般步骤与传统的中密度纤维板工艺相似。将木纤维与不同比例的 HMAL 粘结剂混合，并在含水率约为 20% 的条件下预压形成纤维毡，这样可促进天然纤维与纤维之间的良好熔融以及与木质素粘结剂的粘合。然后，使用机械控制的油热压机在 170 °C 的温度下对纤维毡进行 420 秒的热压，最终形成板材。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset applies to the production of medium-density fiberboard (MDF) utilizing hybrid-modified ammonium lignosulfonate (HMAL) as a binder. It can be beneficial for entities focused on eco-friendly construction and furniture manufacturing industries. This material can be applied to products that require a sustainable wood composite, such as home furnishings, office furniture, and flooring products, as it presents an alternative to traditional MDF using fossil-based UF resin binders.
本数据集适用于中密度纤维板（MDF）的生产，涉及使用木质素磺酸改性铵（HMAL）作为粘合剂。该数据集对注重环保的建筑和家具制造行业具有参考价值。该材料可用于需要可持续木材复合材料的产品中，如家庭家具、办公家具和地板产品，它提供了一个替代传统以化石基UF树脂为粘合剂的MDF的方案。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The inventory data for the foreground (the production of HMAL/WF and conventional MDF), including the material consumption involved in board manufacture, were mainly collected from companies that represent the current domain fiberboard technologies in China. The environmental emission sources were dryers, pressess, mat formers, the biomass boilers, and finishing operations. All emission data were field data corresponding to board manufacturing subsystem, which were estimated according to the emission factors reported by the Ministry of Environmental Protection (MEP) of China (MEP of China 2006). For material transportation, the average distance between the country of origin of the raw materials and the country for the special product is taken from references (Chen et al. 2015). The production process of AL and average data for the representative process from a Chinese chemical company are taken from the reference (Ma et al. 2004). Auxiliary processes include electricity, thermal energy, hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) production (aqueous 50 wt%), paraffin production, and diesel were taken from the Ecoinvent database using China-specific data.

前景（HMAL/WF 和传统中密度纤维板的生产）的清单数据，包括制板过程中的材料消耗，主要从代表中国当前纤维板技术领域的企业收集。环境排放源包括干燥机、压榨机、板坯成型机、生物质锅炉和涂饰作业。所有排放数据都是与纤维板制造子系统相对应的现场数据，并根据中国环境保护部（MEP）报告的排放因子进行估算（中国环境保护部，2006 年）。在材料运输方面，原材料原产国与特殊产品生产国之间的平均距离取自参考文献（Chen 等，2015 年）。AL 的生产工艺和中国化工企业代表性工艺的平均数据来自参考文献（Ma 等，2004 年）。辅助工艺包括电力、热能、过氧化氢（H2O2）生产（50 wt%水溶液）、石蜡生产和柴油，这些数据来自 Ecoinvent 数据库，并使用了中国的具体数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yuan, Y. & Guo, M. Do green wooden composites using lignin-based binder have environmentally benign alternatives? A preliminary LCA case study in China. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1318–1326 (2017).
Yuan, Y. & Guo, M. Do green wooden composites using lignin-based binder have environmentally benign alternatives? A preliminary LCA case study in China. Int J Life Cycle Assess 22, 1318–1326 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment (LCA) calculations, users should take note that the inventory data provided only covers the industrial manufacturing phase, excluding the use and end-of-life stages due to lack of data. Consequently, for comprehensive LCA studies, additional data on the application and disposal phases would need to be acquired separately. Moreover, material transport specifics and auxiliary process energy requirements sourced from the Ecoinvent database should be accurately applied within the regional context. The inclusion of the production and maintenance of capital goods is not covered in this dataset and should be considered minimal in comparison to operational emissions.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估（LCA）计算时，用户应注意，提供的库存数据仅涵盖工业制造阶段，并由于缺乏数据而排除了使用和终身阶段。因此，为了全面的LCA研究，需要另外获取关于应用和处置阶段的数据。此外，从Ecoinvent数据库获取的材料运输具体信息和辅助过程能量需求应在地区范围内准确应用。本数据集不包括资本货物的生产和维护，与运营排放相比，这部分应被视为微不足道。

completeness.common:other: Due to a lack of inventory data on the use and end-of-life phase of HMAL/WF production, this paper is excluded by this phase in the entire life cycle assessment. However, earlier cradle-to-gate LCA researches (Dias and Arroja 2012; González-García et al. 2011; González-García et al. 2009a; Silva et al. 2015) have emphasized that most of the environmental impact results are based on the industrial production phase. Hence, in this study, the cradle-to-gate approach includes only the industrial manufacturing phase. The production and maintenance of capital goods, such as industrial machinery and personnel activities, are not a part of this analysis as they are insignificant compared to the operation (Silva et al. 2013).

由于缺乏有关 HMAL/WF 生产的使用和报废阶段的库存数据，本文在整个生命周期评估中排除了这一阶段。不过，早期的摇篮到终点生命周期评估研究（Dias 和 Arroja，2012 年；González-García 等人，2011 年；González-García 等人，2009 年；Silva 等人，2015 年）强调，大多数环境影响结果都是基于工业生产阶段的。因此，在本研究中，"从摇篮到终点 "方法仅包括工业制造阶段。资本货物的生产和维护，如工业机械和人员活动，不在本分析之列，因为与运营相比，它们微不足道（Silva 等人，2013 年）。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The "wood, primary forest, standing" is selected here, which substitutes for the "green chips (50% water content)" in the paper.
这里选择了“木材、原始森林、站立”，代替了论文中的“绿色芯片（含水量50%）”。
In the paper, the hydrogen peroxide belongs to the input flow, but here, it only could be selected as "Emissions".
在论文中，过氧化氢属于输入流，但在这里，它只能被选择为“排放”。
The "Paraffins" is selected here, which substitutes for the "Paraffin emulsion" in the paper.
这里选择了“石蜡”，它替代了论文中的“石蜡乳液”。

referenceToFlowDataSet.common:shortDescription: Energy, gross calorific value, in biomass, primary forest

exchange.generalComment: The "Energy, gross calorific value, in biomass, primary forest" is selected here, which substitutes for the "Energy from biomass" in the paper.
这里选择了“生物质中的能量，总热值，原始森林”，代替了论文中的“生物质能”。
This is the input flow called the 4–5-t truck in the paper.
这是论文中称为5-t卡车的输入流。
This is the input flow called the 12–14-t truck in the paper.
这是论文中称为12-14-t卡车的输入流。
This is the output flow called "HMAL/WF finished (8% moisture)" in the paper.
这是论文中称为“HMAL/WF成品（8%水分）”的输出流程。
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为bio
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为bio

The "Dust (unspecified, from stack)" is selected here, which substitutes for "Sand down dust" in the paper. This output flow in the paper belongs to the emission to the soil, but the database only has the "Emissions to air" flow.
这里选择了“Dust（未指定，from stack）”，代替了论文中的“Sand down粉尘”。论文中的这个输出流量属于对土壤的排放，但数据库只有“对空气的排放”流量。
The "soft wood (dry matter)" is selected here, which substitutes for the "Filterable matter" in the paper.
这里选择了“软木（干物质）”，它替代了论文中的“可过滤物质”。
